title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 § 2187.1 - Specific actions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 § 2187.1 - Specific actions

State Regulations

The following actions are added to the list of Type II
Actions contained in 6 NYCRR § 617.13(d) and have been determined by the agency
not to have a significant effect on the environment and do not require
environmental impact statements or any other determinations: (a) The rehabilitation, renovation, replacement, upgrading, or extension of utility distribution (i.e., infrastructure) facilities to serve new or altered one- to four-family
residential structures or to render service in approved subdivisions, unless
such facility meets or exceeds any of the thresholds in 6 NYCRR §
617.12. (b) A transfer of ownership
for the purposes of creating a "mobile home park cooperative"--i.e., the
establishment of a corporation formed for the purpose of owning a mobile home
park wherein the ownership of such shares will entitle the owners thereof to
occupancy in such park pursuant to section
352-e
of
the General Business Law. (c) The
rehabilitation, renovation, upgrading, maintenance or repair of a mobile home
park involving no substantial changes in existing structures or
facilities. Notes
